name: CGPSConverter
desc: An opaque data type used to convert PostScript data to PDF data.

items.name: init?(info: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?, callbacks: UnsafePointer<CGPSConverterCallbacks>, options: CFDictionary?)
var isConverting: Bool
items.desc: Checks whether the converter is currently converting data.

items.name: class var typeID: CFTypeID
items.desc: Returns the Core Foundation type identifier for PostScript converters.

items.name: func abort() -> Bool
items.desc: Tells a PostScript converter to abort a conversion at the next available opportunity.

items.name: func convert(CGDataProvider, consumer: CGDataConsumer, options: CFDictionary?) -> Bool
items.desc: Uses a PostScript converter to convert PostScript data to PDF data.
